pullRequest.title: Read JAVA_OPTIONS env var before OPENJ9_JAVA_OPTIONS
pullRequest.bodyText:
Also fix bug when -XX:+UseNoGC is used in an environment variable.
Fixes #8641
Doc issue eclipse-openj9/openj9-docs#652

nodes.bodyText: Why not fold this initialization into the declaration?

beforeCommit.message:
Read JAVA_OPTIONS env var before OPENJ9_JAVA_OPTIONS

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText:
I know this isn't new code but it looks like we index off the end of the buffer here if gcPolicyString = "nogc".
Likely fixable by setting
gcPolicyString = "-Xgcpolicy:nogc"
I think this second call to strstr() can be replaced by *xjvmstr.
nit: spaces missing around ? and : (here and on line 153).
nit: spaces missing around + (here and several places below).

commit.message:
Read JAVA_OPTIONS env var before OPENJ9_JAVA_OPTIONS

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

Fix bug when -XX:+UseNoGC used in environment variable

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

beforeCommit.message:
Fix nits round 1

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

afterCommit.message:
Fix bug when -XX:+UseNoGC used in environment variable

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>
